language_changed_successfully: The language has been changed successfully.
language_changer_chat:
Here you can change the language used for the bot throughout the chat.
If your language is not listed here and you would like to contribute, go to @AmanoChat.
language_changer_private: Here you can change the language used for the bot in this private chat. If you want to change the language of your group, please run the command /setchatlang on it. If your language is not listed here and you would like to contribute, go to @AmanoChat.
